entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023
